title: As a airline, ship operator, export shop or duty-free store, I need to get approval from HMRC, so that I can sell duty-free or duty-paid tobacco to passengers travelling to other countries (103179)

details.role: airline, ship operator, export shop or duty-free store
details.benefit: I can sell duty-free or duty-paid tobacco to passengers travelling to other countries
justifications: It's something that people can do or it's something people need to know before they can do something that's regulated by/related to government
met_when: know the different rules for each type of business/person
knows if they need to register with or get approval from HMRC
can get further guidance for their specific circumstances

available_translations.title: As a airline, ship operator, export shop or duty-free store, I need to get approval from HMRC, so that I can sell duty-free or duty-paid tobacco to passengers travelling to other countries (103179)
